scripts.build-firefox: rm -r dist/firefox/* && cp -R assets/ dist/firefox/assets/ && cp background.js dist/firefox/background.js && cp browserApiFirefox.js dist/firefox/browserApi.js && cp manifest-firefox.json dist/firefox/manifest.json
scripts.build-chrome: rm -r dist/chrome/* && cp -R assets/ dist/chrome/assets/ && cp background.js dist/chrome/background.js && cp browserApiChrome.js dist/chrome/browserApi.js && cp manifest-chrome.json dist/chrome/manifest.json
scripts.build-all: npm run build-firefox && npm run build-chrome
